content:
ICS 8 - Introduction to Computer Security Homework 4, 50 Points
Due: Tuesday, October 26, 2010, at the beginnning of class

  1. Problem R-4.1 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  2. Problem R-4.3 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  3. Problem R-4.5 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  4. Problem R-4.13 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  5. Problem R-4.15 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  6. Problem R-4.16 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  7. Problem C-4.4 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 10 points.
  8. Problem C-4.8 from Chapter 4, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 10 points.
Please write no more than a single paragraph for an answer to any R- or C-question. In many cases, a single sentence could be sufficient.
